mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_users (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, user_phone, user_gender, user_address, cop_seq) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone}, #{userGender}, #{userAddress}, 4)
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_users set user_pwd = #{userPwd} where user_seq = #{userSeq}
mapper.select: select cop_seq, cop_reg_num, cop_name, uc.user_seq, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_image, emp_position, emp_image, auth_level from (select c.cop_seq, cop_reg_num, cop_name, user_seq, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_image from (select user_seq, user_id, user_name, user_email, user_image, cop_seq from tb_users where user_state = true) as u inner join (select cop_seq, cop_reg_num, cop_name from tb_companys where cop_state = true) as c on u.cop_seq = c.cop_seq) as uc inner join (select user_seq, emp_position, emp_image, auth_level from tb_employees where emp_state = true) as e on uc.user_seq = e.user_seq where uc.user_seq = #{userSeq};
